name: Where we'll live for nine days
name_original: Where we'll live for nine days
description:
A small flat. Uncertain light. Two frightened people locked in for nine days. Eroding sense of reality.

An ambiguous story where feelings, memories and words themselves are unreliable.

🌒

Where we'll live for nine days

A fragmented story

🌒

A short horror text-based interactive story made of fragmented memories to be pieced together. Your choices don't change the story, only the way it is told.

6th position in Ectocomp 2017!

🕑 Playthrough length: approximately 10 minutes.

🖵 Fullscreen recommended.

📱 Playable in  mobile.

Written with Twine for Ectocomp 2017.
